instruction: Find the transparent board with a battery (B1) on it
additional_text: The batteries are transparent white with orange and grey batteries. They have 'B1', '3V', and a red circuit power symbol.

instruction: Place the Speaker (SP) horizontally, one unit to the right of the battery.
additional_text: The speaker is red with a circular speaker and white base. It has 'SP' on it.

instruction: Place a 2-connection horizontally, connecting the battery to the Speaker.
additional_text: The 2-connection is blue with 2 silver pins. It has the label '2' on it. It should be placed horizontally, connecting the Battery and the Speaker.

instruction: Place the Music IC (U1) vertically from F6 to F7 with the text U1 facing the right, right below the Speaker.
additional_text: The Music IC is blue and has 'U1' and 'Music IC' on it.

instruction: Place a 2-connection vertically, connecting the Music IC to the Speaker.
additional_text: The 2-connection is blue with 2 silver pins. It has the label '2' on it. It should be placed vertically, connecting the speaker and the blue Music IC.

instruction: Place a 3-connection horizontally, 2 units below the bottom of the battery.
additional_text: The 3-connection is blue with 3 silver pins. It has the label '3' on it. It should be placed horizontally.

instruction: Place a 3-connection vertically, connecting the left of the battery to the existing 3 connection.
additional_text: The 3-connection is blue with 3 silver pins. It has the label '3' on it. It should be placed vertically from the battery to the other 3 connection.

instruction: Place the Switch (S1) horizontally between the 3 connection and the Music IC.
additional_text: The switch is green with a white base. It has 'S1' on it. It should connect the 3-connection and the Music IC.

instruction: You're done! Turn on the Switch (S1)!
